item.title: [508] Pur3zScape [508]
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

There has been a Problem in the Players…
When they click on the Quest tab to choose they’re Style “Master” or “pure”, doesn’t matter which.
The server logs them out (obviously), then when they try to log back in, they’re passwords have been changed…it’s a problem with the source i don’t know how to fix.
but according to this everything seems to be fine.

/** * Player's username. */ public String username = "null"; 
/**
 * Player's password.
 */
public String password = "";
/**
 * Player's rights.
 */
public int rights = 0;
/**</blockquote>

And yes i’ve tried replacing the blank space in " " to Null.

Please tell me what i need to do to fix this problem, thanks.

Read full topic
